thread.title: 20th-century masterpieces on tap at fall NYC art auctions
thread.title_full: 20th-century masterpieces on tap at fall NYC art auctions

title: 20th-century masterpieces on tap at fall NYC art auctions
text:
> Entertainment 20th-century masterpieces on tap at fall NYC art auctions In this image provided by Christies is the 1969 painting, "Homme à l’épée," by Spanish artist Pablo Picasso. “Man with a Sword,” a self-portrait of the artist as a musketeer, will be auctioned at Christie's, Nov. 9, 2015. (Christie's via AP) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
